p: The title compound was obtained in 61% yield from compound 33 followed the general procedure for Suzuki arylation: 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 3.90 (s, 3H), 4.70 (s, 2H), 6.70 (d, J = 7.8 Hz, 1H), 7.22 (s, 1H), 7.46 (t, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 7.52 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 2H), 7.75 (t, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 8.00–8.06 (m, 3H), 8.34 (d, J = 8.1 Hz, 1H), 8.51 (s, 1H), 8.59 (s, 1H), 9.05 (d, J = 2.4 Hz, 1H).
